4f031499-20ad-458e-ae3f-e6c6b72548d2.name: Very Resilient Quintessence
4f031499-20ad-458e-ae3f-e6c6b72548d2.notes: +2 to QN rolls. Lose QP to involuntary drain at half the rate, and recover QP at double the rate.

7ed85c89-ecf1-4001-9f9c-afb6fa7973da.notes: +1 to QN rolls. Recover QP at twice the normal rate.
